website_summaries.verdict: Some question its authenticity as a wok, but this pan performs all wok duties exceedingly well. The highest quality available.
pros: Stainless steel and aluminum cause heat to spread evenly on bottom and sides
cons: Pan is heavy, which may make tossing and flipping difficult

customer_reviews.title: Looks great after a year of punishment!
customer_reviews.text: My wife is Chinese and tends to cook at high heat which has result in a couple of my good quality pans being covered in carbon. We've had this wok for about a year and although it has taken the same punishment many times, it remains spotless. Frequently she will leave it black and I have assumed that the wok is ruined but after a 10 minute soak in hot soapy water, the deposits wipe away and it looks like new again. Highly recommended. Update: We've now had the wok for 5.5 years. It's still the same, no problems at all after using daily over that period.
customer_reviews.author: P. Bateman

customer_reviews.title: BEST OF THE BUNCH
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased three different types of woks in the past (12" steel curved bottom, 14" steel flat bottom, and this one). This the the best among the ones I had. Easy to clean, does not rust, heavy duty stainless, heat evenly on electric coil stove tops, not too heavy. Can't beat that!
customer_reviews.author: M. F.

customer_reviews.title: Food sticks to the bottom, a pain to clean, messy.
customer_reviews.text: Thought this would work. Wound up getting rid of it. Stainless requires much more oil and the food sticks to the bottom of the wok very easily. Cannot see thru lid. Hard to cook food thoroughly before it crusts and burns at the bottom. Too much trouble to clean. Likely any of the ceramic non-stick, multi-coated products would work much better than this, would be easier to clean, and you wouldn't have to use as much oil, or stand there every second waiting and watching for it to smoke. Wouldn't recommend this product, wasted my money!
customer_reviews.author: Cody J

customer_reviews.title: My Third Cooks Standard Pan
customer_reviews.text: First: This is the third Cooks Standard pan I have purchased. Second: Any person looking to buy stainless steel pans needs to do some research about cooking with and cleaning the pans because, plain and simple, stainless steel is different from non stick. That out of the way, I simply love my Cooks Standard pans! Impressive weight. Long handles. Concerning this wok, I've fallen in love with grapeseed oil (vs olive oil) because of the higher temperature rating but an eye still needs to pay attention to what's going on inside the wok.
customer_reviews.author: From NJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for stir frying on glass topped stoves.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand the negative reviews. Food does not stick for me. I only use at medium or lower on an induction stove. I like the big flat bottom as it gives maximum heating surface. Probably the same on an electric stove. I think it would work fine on a gas stove too but a round bottom could also be used there. I like the ability to cook on the flat surface, push that food up the sides to a cooler area and continue to cook other ingredients on the flat surface and then mix everything and put the lid on for a few minutes, if desired. In this way, everything ingredient in the dish is cooked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, will probably rival an All-Clad cookware (I own a set of the All-Clad MC2 cookware and I am saying this from my experience). Nice size for a family of 4-6, and the shape is fairly deep, the cover is a nice high dome. Heats up fairly fast on the high burner. The bottom does and will get scratched, but not to the point that it ruins the wok, and besides it just shows that you are really using it. Just don't forget to clean it good to rid of the machine oil. Clean it, then put dish detergent in it with water and let it boil and clean it again.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Wok
customer_reviews.text: Cooks Standard NC-00233 Wok w/lid Sits flat, heavy duty takes awhile to heat up as it is electric stove top model which is perfect for me, pour some peanut oil or whatever oil you use do not use spray oil, set your heat setting like medium and start preparing your stir-fry then just before you add your veggies or protein crank up to medium high wait a couple minutes and drop in pan. This is a great wok course hours after I purchase it 69.96 it dropped in price by 7.59 new retail $62.37 very worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Will The Thrill

customer_reviews.title: The lid is actually the great part. It fits exactly on my 12" scan ...
customer_reviews.text: I got to admit that I wasn't sure about this brand. I'm use to using all-clad or scanpan. I needed a wok and the others were just so expensive, couldn't afford it. Decided to try it out. So far, it works well after 3 months or so. The lid is actually the great part. It fits exactly on my 12" scan pan nonstick pan. Saved me from having to buy one of those. It's a one piece so it's easy to clean. No tiny crevices to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Togeri

customer_reviews.title: Great wok to cook up some Chinese food!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great wok for frying. We mostly cook Chinese food in our household and our old wok was pretty busted. This wok looks beautiful with the stainless steel. Just having it out on the stove totally changes the look of the kitchen. Haven't had any issues with markings or stains after cooking. It's a bit on the heavier side.
customer_reviews.author: Chao ChaoTop Contributor: Amiibo

customer_reviews.title: Versatile wok, use it a lot
customer_reviews.text: Pros Great wok for cooking all kind of dishes, curries, fried rice, biriyani, noodles etc. Can cook a large amount for 7-8 person Easy to clean, I soak in water and clean with washing soda. Cons The wok is quite heavy, specially the lid. May be the ss lid would be lighter. Don't know. For removing the rainbow stain I use stainless steel cleaner occasionally. But it requires a bit of pressure to get rid of all the white and rainbow stain. I would give it a 5 star if it was highly nonsticky when seasoned or heated properly. Sometimes food stick. Overall I'd recommend this wok. I love the way I find it helpful for a variety of dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Mayeesha

customer_reviews.title: Really like this pan
customer_reviews.text: My husband got this for me as the cast iron wok was too heavy for me. This is lightweight and works really well. I like the flat bottom and curved sides, makes it easy to brown things and then move them off the heat to cook more food. It cleans up very easy too. Heats up great, no splatter, I can move it around with one hand while stirring too.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Blaszkow

customer_reviews.title: Worst pan, stick pan!
customer_reviews.text: This wok is very heavy, slippery in use when you cook or clean it, hard to hold in hand, and the biggest problem, food materials always stick on the bottom, no matter how many oil you use or how hot you set the fire, meet or fish always stick to the pan, have used it for couple weeks, the situation is still the same, regrat didnt start using it after a month of the purchase, missed the return close date. The worst pan have ever used in my life. Would throw it rather than using it and get frastrited every every time!
customer_reviews.author: Fei

customer_reviews.title: Nice construction.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best wok I've had in a while, and I've had a few. My last one I just had to trash, cracked because of the heat and it was a carbon steel wok. I hope stainless lasts longer. The wok is as nicely constructed as any All-Clad or Calphalon I looked at. It's made in China and the flat bottom is larger than I am used to, those are the only faults I've found. Most of my other woks had a much smaller flat bottom cooking surface, but this one seems to warm up much faster that the others, especially on my induction stove.
customer_reviews.author: D. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Love at first sight!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! After buying a cheap nonstick wok that only lasted about 4 uses before the nonstick coating started to peel off, I decided that I needed a "forever" wok and started looking for something that was high-quality and less than a C-note. After finding this wok recommendation on another website, I decided to take the plunge and I am so glad I did. It's huge and it sits flat on my ceramic stovetop. It spread heat evenly and exceeded all of my expectations. I seriously plan on trying out some more Cooks Standard cookware based on my experience with my new favorite wok.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Good for a crowd
customer_reviews.text: This wok with cover is well-constructed and solid, but it was HUGE. Way too big for a regular domestic stove that doesn't have 22,000 BTUs on a burner. Also the flat bottom was 7.5 inches in diameter, so really detracted from the use as a true WOK b/c the flat area was too big. Some may like this, but you will have to adjust your Chinese cooking approach b/c of the way the heat is distributed on the flat bottom surface.
customer_reviews.author: T. O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Good Multipurpose Household Pan
customer_reviews.text: I use this for stir-fry, deep fry and steaming in conjunction with a bamboo steamer. The high domed lid is excellent for trapping steam and heating things evenly in the steamer. The pan occasionally has a hard time heating evenly (it tends to overheat in the corners and the sides rarely get hot enough for proper stir-fry) but it is generally very servicable for home cooking. This pan can hold a TON of vegetables, is a great shape for conserving oil while deep frying, and cleans remarkably easily either by hand or in the dishwasher. I use it 2-4 times a week and it is in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Good stir-fry pan at a good price!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a great stir fry pan!!! So far we have used it several times and nothing has destroyed it yet. My husband has a bad habit of cooking at high heat in this pan which I was worried he would ruin it......nope. It is still good to use. The metal does become discolored from cooking, but that is normal for stainless steel cookware. I love how deep it is and having the domed cover helps when you have a lot of bulky food to cook like spinach. Very heavy duty and worth the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This stainless steel wok is a great buy! It is heavy but I expect good quality steel not to be flimsy. I have used it twice and while some customers talk about sticking food, I think that they are not cooking it on high heat, and not stirring. Don't expect it to act like the non-stick surfaces, but since that technology is being banned (due to toxicity) it cleans up well. Am buying a steamer insert (at Amazon) and am excited for this wok to do double duty and steam tamales.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Pauline Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: It will get scratched
customer_reviews.text: Not the best product in the market. I am saying this for the following reasons: - It will get discolored if you put it above medium heat. - The Sides of the wok are too thin - If you use a metal spatula it will get dented I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: prabhav

customer_reviews.title: Worst pan ever
customer_reviews.text: I have many others a Cook’s Standard pans and they are wonderful. This pan however is terrible. Everything sticks to it no matter how much oil I use. I bought it for noodle dishes, stir fry, and fried rice, it’s utterly impossible to cook rice or noodles in it as they immediately are cemented to the pan. Tofu becomes a crumbled mess with half stuck to the pan. Sadly it’s going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: J. J.

customer_reviews.title: Good far large meals
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy. I often make stir fry and was looking for a stir fry pan that could hold a great deal of food as I have growing kiddos in the house. The picture attached to this review is of three (yes, three) bags of dinner for two pasta bag meals. So far I have used this pan yo make a variety of meals ans have been pleased with it. The pan have even heat distribution and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Food sticks
customer_reviews.text: No matter how much oil you use, food sticks. would not recommend, use a non stick coated service for better results.
customer_reviews.author: RN

customer_reviews.title: Food sticks to bottom!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Food sticks to the bottom: eggs, fries!...It is heavy, but I could manage that...:)
customer_reviews.author: ana maria singeorzan

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this wok/skillet. The handle on the lid and the side handles do not get hot. However it is heavy but I would still buy it again. I'm in my 60's. Cleans easily. Let Bon Ami soak in it for stuck on food. Don't scrub it.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn J. Turner

customer_reviews.title: If you have an electic stove,  this is the one.  You won't be dissapointed.
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for a wide bottom wok to use on my smooth top electric range. I previously purchased a flat bottm cast iron wok which was just okay. Absolutely love this wok. Handles high heat, easy to clean, not heavey like the cast iron wok. Perfect. This is my third Cook's multi-ply clad stainless steel cookware purchase, quality product. If you have an electic stove, this is the one. You won't be dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Jaskolka

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I am very excited about my new wok 😁. Cooking is one of my passions🥰 and I've always wanted a wok, so it's great to find one that is very affordable. Delivery was fast, convenient and packaged 📦 very well. I have not used it just yet but I will for tonight's dinner and I will update my review. Another thing I like is that there is a lifetime guarantee and a lot of great features👍🏾! Check out my pics to see this beautiful wok!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley and Travis

customer_reviews.title: Food sticks, annoying to clean, poor heat distribution
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst wok I've ever used. Food sticks to the bottom no matter how much oil you put in or how low you put the heat. On medium heat it takes twice the time to stir fry meat and vegetables as a normal wok. It is also heavy and difficult to handle. Highly advise against purchasing this product. I will be throwing it out or giving it away.
customer_reviews.author: J Green

customer_reviews.title: Great wok
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly with my new induction cooktop. Perfect size, love the domed lid. What more is there to say. Stuff is now wokking and cooking, instead of just steaming and boiling, like my old wok did.
customer_reviews.author: Simona Dedek

customer_reviews.title: ... 12 piece set that matches this wok and I love them all
customer_reviews.text: I have the 12 piece set that matches this wok and I love them all! I ordered this via Amazon Prime and it arrived in two days. Once I unboxed it, you could really tell that it was very well made. Sort of on the heavy side, but not "cast iron" heavy. The dome lid is very nice. It is rather large, so I have to store it on a separate shelf, but there's nothing bad about that! These Cooks Standard pots are a nice investment. They are heavy and hold heat very well, which is good for stir fry! Overall, I expect this wok to last for a lifetime or more!
customer_reviews.author: Giwdul

customer_reviews.title: This thing is big
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a large wok to make Chinese food in bulk on my electric stove. This thing certainly fits that bill. It's really large -- larger than I expected. You could feed 10 people with this thing -- or make a large batch of food to last a week. The quality is very nice. It's thick, heavy and well-built. It takes a while to get up to the high temperature that is ideal to get that authentic wok flavor, but it works well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely shiny keeps drawing my attention
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item because when I stirred food am I other pan sometimes food would go over the edge onto the stove. This item is large and should hold enough food for between four and six people. It is all Chrome so if you are attracted to shiny things you may get distracted by this item in your kitchen. I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: G. Jablonkay

customer_reviews.title: This is the one.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful finish, proper weight, quality construction, even heat distribution, great price, and and does a great job on the food. Bought one for myself, my sister, and my brother. Also purchased the spatula that Amazon paired with it.Thank you Amazon for the suggestion. The comfortable quality spatula works very well with the curved sides of the pan.
customer_reviews.author: Steven G.

customer_reviews.title: Good for cooking
customer_reviews.text: It’s good for cooking. After oil and pot is hot, it won’t stick like my old one. Only thing I want to complain is the handle. Not easy to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson H.

customer_reviews.title: Best wok ever!
customer_reviews.text: Been searching for a wok forever in the US and so far haven't found one I like. THis wok is thick enough--yes heavy but that's try ply--that it doesn't stick easily, unless your stove fire is too strong. Handles stay satisfactorily cool so you can grip safely, easily. Easy clean. It's great value too. Every time I cook with it i have a smile on my face! Will definitely consider this brand for my future purchase. I've used 2 of their items to replace my non stick cookware and they work so well, with very reasonable price. That's the kind of quality and price that's just right, or exceeds expectation!
customer_reviews.author: carefulbuy

customer_reviews.title: I love it woks and woks.
customer_reviews.text: It's big, heavy, stainless, and distributes heat okay. With the lid and space it gives me to cook in I can remove a lot of limitations on how much I can cook. It's gorgeous when you first get it but you'll cook that right out of it. I would buy it for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy wok but works well
customer_reviews.text: Kind of a bully wok, not the easiest to clean due to weight and size. It's a nice stir fry wok tho. Like any new wok, cook in it a few times to season it and understand how to not let things stick. I'm not a meat eater so veggies and rice have no issues sticking.
customer_reviews.author: MooseMalarkey

customer_reviews.title: Food sticks and ruins tofu
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on reviews. It seemed to have more 5 star reviews then 1 Star. Well, it is a beautiful pan but again like many say the food sticks and no matter how much oil you use it still sticks. Seems to only be with meats and tofu. It’s a mess to clean and I end up cooking the meat in another pan which makes this useless! I don’t recommend! Waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Simons

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but...
customer_reviews.text: This wok works very well for stir fry, but only if you have a heat source which will heat to at least 500 degrees F. I first tried it on my electric stove. It didn't get hot enough, leaving the stir fry kind of soggy and mediocre. Next I tried it on my portable single burner convection stove which heats up to approx. 580 degrees F. When I saw the avocado oil start to smoke, I added the stir fry. It turned out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: GregB

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: This pot is really, really heavy and hard to use. Even a simple scrambled egg will stick to the pot. The most important thing is that it is very difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel WOK
customer_reviews.text: Get easily burn if on high heat. Must supervise when on high heat even if just for seconds. Medium heat is recommended!!! NOT scratch resistant as described by seller!!! Over all good WOK pan
customer_reviews.author: F.G.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material causing stains
customer_reviews.text: This is terrible from the get go! It looked like either it was used already with stains or the company used some sort of chemicals to make the pan and it left a nasty stain. Either way, it looks like cheap and I wouldn’t use it for my family. Went to William Sonoma and bought a quality one.
customer_reviews.author: G. Wei

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for stirfrys ! Great quality steel and easy to clean. This wok seems like it will last awhile so it’s a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: AJW

customer_reviews.title: Best wok ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan. We use it for all kinds of things but our favorite is fried rice. :) This, just like all the rest of our cooks standard pots and pans are so nice, have good weight to them, easy to clean and cook with also. I love this brand and this wok is very roomy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: The wok is better than expected. I prefer stainless to carbon steel for cleanup. This pan conducts he just as well as traditional woks I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Richard V E

customer_reviews.title: Great Wok!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow.... we had a traditional steel wok and we had to keep it oiled and out of the humidity to keep it from rusting. Now... this new Stainless Steel Wok has won its place in the kitchen....quality is great... love the stay cool handle and it works GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carib-Islander

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality and price!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, love this pan!!!!! Tri-ply construction at an unbelievable low price. It has a beautiful finish inside and out, the handle and extra help handle (awesome to have because it is heavy) are well constructed and secured. This pan and its great dome cover fits in beautifully with my All Clad and Calphalon Tri Ply stainless steel cookware. It is super easy to clean and it is a wonderful all around deep pan as well as my fave wok pan for glass top flat cooking surface.
customer_reviews.author: Gilgomez

customer_reviews.title: good wok
customer_reviews.text: I am using this as a wok. I have been using woks with non-stick coating (such as Circulon). I have been worrying about ingesting the non-stick coating. This is the first time I am using a stainless steel version and there is no non-stick coating. So far, my experience has been positive. It weighs about six pounds and is definitely the heaviest wok I have ever used. If the wok is full, one might have problem lifting the wok with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Ming the Merciless

customer_reviews.title: V ery Fine Quality
customer_reviews.text: It does work on an Induction Stove like stated. Heats even and stays at temp. Very fine wok for the price and the appearance is fantastic. Recommend this wok to everyone. Did I mention fast, on time delivery? Yeppers.
customer_reviews.author: J. Prewitt

customer_reviews.title: Best wok I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: We've had this wok for eight months now. Once we broke it in (after a few weeks) we've been using it constantly and it doesn't stain and cleans up really easy. If there is one draw back, its the fact that more oil is needed to stop food sticking to it. It works for us because we use olive oil so it's not unhealthy. I would recommend this to everyone that likes stir fry.
customer_reviews.author: Husband & Handyman

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy a second one if I needed to.
customer_reviews.text: I’m more than happy with this wok. Not only pretty but very functional. Heavy weight with large capacity to toss and stir fry large portions.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: The quality looks good ,but It’s heavy and not easy to clean.so I buy another different one instead of it
customer_reviews.author: cherry

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected. This is a large wok that has weight to it and cooks evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Always shopping

customer_reviews.title: This is an absolutely BEAUTIFUL pan! The weight is perfect and you can ...
customer_reviews.text: OMG. This is an absolutely BEAUTIFUL pan! The weight is perfect and you can do just about anything with it! I created a perfect sear on a pot roast, and even made a super delicious stir fry! I am completely happy with this product and I recommend it highly! My husband and I have been looking for a great set of pots and pans and we are going to start collecting all of these. The handle doesn't hot, which was a concern of mine so I am very happy! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Glass Half Spilled

customer_reviews.title: Not fun to use
customer_reviews.text: This pan is heavier than I like, and I can't get rice grain stains out of the pan. I've never had this happen before with other pans.
customer_reviews.author: ImaFan

customer_reviews.title: versatile wok
customer_reviews.text: This wok is large and great for stir frying or frying chicken. It comes with a cover and I've yet to use it but it will be useful if I want to keep the food warm in the wok. It's easy to cook in and the food doesn't stick. It's much easier to use than a carbon steel wok. It does leave a bluish ring which you can remove using vinegar or Bar Keepers Friend. It's a little heavy but having the extra handle is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Happy retiree

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the quality of the Pan. Heavy bottom. I used once but was happy that my food did not stick to the bottom of the pan. I am confident that this was an excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Murray

customer_reviews.title: Love this wok
customer_reviews.text: This pan works great and cleans easily. It is pretty heavy, i weighed myself and then with the pan and it weighs 4lbs, without the lid. Only the outside handle doesn't get hot so don't touch the inside handle. The only thing we didn't like is that there wasn't any directions on how to use the pan for someone who is new to stainless steel. This means that most the items that we have cooked with stuck to the pan. we are still trying to figure out how to get some items to refrain from sticking as well. However there is no Teflon and the pan heats well and retains its heat so we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Utilitarian and fine looking...
customer_reviews.text: The pan fits well in my daily cooking regimen. It’s well made and functional. The flat bottom flaring into the rounded sides adapts well to my cooking needs. Also, it’s a good looking pan!
customer_reviews.author: Brian F. McGee

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Steel Stir Fry Pan with Dome Lid 13-Inch Multi-Ply Clad
customer_reviews.text: I love the way the heat is distributed and the non-stick feature. We stir fry at least twice a week, heats up fast and food is done in a jiff.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Ridgaway

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, a bit heavy
customer_reviews.text: It is a good pan all around. My only grip is the weight, a bit on the heavy side.
customer_reviews.author: C. Xiao

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this wok. Just the right size, and the stainless steel feels like a good quality. Good price too
customer_reviews.author: Terry L

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and clean
customer_reviews.text: This is a good piece of cookware. It’s not non stick but it is pretty good at giving a wok-like sear to stir fry.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Kim

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pan
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this once on my induction burner. It performed well and I did not find it all that hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: TomG

customer_reviews.title: Great Size and I Love to cook!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the size and how quickly my food cooks in this wok as being stainless steel it is easy to clean up as well. I really want to cook with this wok everyday now and make healthier recipes to share with my family now i am in love with this one my last wok was to small and seemed to take longer to cook for some reason. I received this free as part of a product review but this is still solely my own opinion which may differ from yours.
customer_reviews.author: Missy's Product Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Even heat
customer_reviews.text: I have a gas stove, Kenmore elite, with the main burner at max heat this pan distributes heat like a champ. It's a large pan, great for cooking meals for 4+ people, or less with leftovers!
customer_reviews.author: Some Dude

customer_reviews.title: just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This wok does exactly what I was hoping for. My old wok would not work on our new ceramic stove top, it did not have a flat enough bottom and developed hot spots when cooking. This wok works great with this stove with even heating. I am definitely enjoying this wok.
customer_reviews.author: B Maze

customer_reviews.title: She Cooks Great and She's Beautiful Too
customer_reviews.text: If you know how to cook and how to use stainless steel cookware properly, this is for you. The quality is great and it works great on a glass top stove. The heat distribution is exceptional. It is designed well and beautiful to look at too and you cannot beat the price. I keep mine on top of the stove all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Joe from Tall Oaks

customer_reviews.title: very solid pan
customer_reviews.text: at first I want to return it and buy a non-sticky pan instead. Then I bought a non-sticky pan but still keep this one. I use this one everyday though it is sticky but it feels very good. I am happy I chose to keep it
customer_reviews.author: dongshiyu

customer_reviews.title: The lid handle gets hot!!
customer_reviews.text: Most part I like it. The lid handle gets really hot!! So be careful.
customer_reviews.author: James007

customer_reviews.title: Great pan
customer_reviews.text: I like the weight and balance. It over all a great pan! It did stain a bit but doesn’t seem to affect cooking
customer_reviews.author: Rober B. Allen Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Well made, large wok
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made, large wok. Pros: Large size, stainless, good and even heat transfer, lidded. Cons: It is quite large so while it fits on a regular 4-burner home gas range, it does take up quite a bit of space. It is also fairly heavy so one needs a decent amount of wrist and arm strength to be able to lift it and do the classic wok-toss. Overall, I am very happy with it and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Neil C

customer_reviews.title: Great Wok
customer_reviews.text: We have not used a wok in a very long time. My wife is now using this more than any of our pans. Great heat distribution.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Torgerson

customer_reviews.title: Very good wok, but not non-stick!
customer_reviews.text: Although I was shopping for a non-stick surface induction wok, I chose this stainless steel model and am not disappointed. It heats up nicely, keeps the food in and is easy to clean up. It has a nice weight and the grab handle is very practical and won't get hot. I am very satisfied with this wok and recommend it for induction cookers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wok and roll with this wok!
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best wok I have ever owned, and I've gone through a few. Works on my new induction cooktop. The lid is a great feature. You can let stuff steam in it. If food burns on, after an all night soak, comes right off with a little scrub.
customer_reviews.author: shipsbells

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for family of 5. Good cleanup.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Cooks nicely, cleans up beautifully. The large size makes cooking for our family of 5 seamless.
customer_reviews.author: JillWeehawken

customer_reviews.title: Lovely CS, nice stainless steel wok pan
customer_reviews.text: I doubt that I got a defected one. I contacted the customer service, they just sent me another one. And used for a year now. I love this wok pan, the only down side is too heavy for me, haha.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Tsui

customer_reviews.title: Good size and quality
customer_reviews.text: Loved the size and how sturdy it is. I use it mainly for stir fry and it cooks beautifully
customer_reviews.author: YS

customer_reviews.title: Not just a wok
customer_reviews.text: We use it for stir fry (of course). But we also steam lobsters, corn, etc. A nice versatile addition to our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: C. Person

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Used it the other night and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow. My husband got this for me for Christmas. Love it. Used it the other night and it cooks so evenly,cleans easily.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne P.

customer_reviews.title: I think it's wonderful - looks good as new after several months
customer_reviews.text: I think it's wonderful - looks good as new after several months, the bottom is thick and food doesn't stick and get burned. I'm glad I threw away my old wok in favor of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Deliutz

customer_reviews.title: Cooks so well
customer_reviews.text: We really like how well it cooks the different vegetables that we have tried. It was a little larger and heavier that we had expected but our meals turn out very well.
customer_reviews.author: Billie S. Nenninger

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for, this is perfect and I have no complaints. The customer service was also great as I accidentally transposed the numbers of my address but called the seller and they fixed it as soon as I notified them, and it was still delivered the same day!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Well made and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The wok is very well made. I used it for big or small dishes, stir-fry or with liquid. It sits on the stove just right. It is not too heavy to handle. Cleaning is easy too.
customer_reviews.author: Y Sena

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully designed and a bottom that is a perfect fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully designed and a bottom that is a perfect fit for most burners, it is important to prepare the wok as per instructions before first use. I thought I had, but my first use of it resulted in much sticking. I decided to "season" it with coconut oil and have, subsequently, had no problem with the sticking issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quite disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Scratches very easily and new stains and marks appear after every time I use it. I expected a better quality product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tony B

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Love it made nice and strong not hard to clean
customer_reviews.author: Frank R

customer_reviews.title: I love this high quality stainless Wok
customer_reviews.text: I love this high quality stainless Wok, I made dinner in it last night on my induction burner, and I'm very pleased with it. I washed it in the sink after and it was very easy to clean, I'm very happy and you will be too. Don't hesitate to buy one for your self.
customer_reviews.author: william devore

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy wok
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several woks and really like this one. It is well made and distributes heat and has nice lid. You won't regret the purchase
customer_reviews.author: J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, works well, very easy to clean. Food doesn't stick - although I haven't tried to fry an egg in it. I put oil in the wok after it heats up. The only negative is that it's a little bit heavy - not as heavy as some others that I have picked up in the stores though. It's not too bad, easy to move with one hand but hard to tip food out of it single handedly. Easy with two hands though. All three handles stay cool, even on a gas stove.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love this pan
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love this pan!!!! We keep it on the stove because we use it almost every night if were not BBQing. Its very easy to clean too
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: This wok pan is great! Very large, very heavy and heats evenly. Cleans easily. I add water and boil for a moment before cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: DinDenver

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This wok does what it is suppose to do, however it is NOT nonstick. Food sticks very easily and I am always scrubbing the pan after each use. Only complaint though.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan! I've used it 2 or 3 times a week for months. Cleans up beautifully, even when I burn some cornstarch in it. The handle stays cool. Food cooks quickly and evenly. Great for stir fry.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: ... replaced our tephlan wok with this one and absolutely love this wok
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our tephlan wok with this one and absolutely love this wok. Cooks perfectly and cleans well with a little “elbow grease”.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Gabel

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: I love this Wok and cooking in it. It is really great.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Seriously love this!
customer_reviews.text: this is now my favorite cooking item. You can cook everything in it, and I have. It cleans up very easily, as long as you heat it up correctly--when the rim is hot to the touch, you are pretty much good to go. I haven't had anything stick to it yet, and I have used it almost daily for a month, including a stir-fry with eggs.
customer_reviews.author: K. Raynolds

customer_reviews.title: Best Phad Thai in this!
customer_reviews.text: Nice wok. I couldn't make my Phad Thai ever turn out right until I bought this wok.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Been using this wok for about 2 months. The ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using this wok for about 2 months. The quality of the stainless steel is comparable to the expensive ones. I wasn't able to distinguish any differences. Also when cooking fried rice this baby doesn't stick. But remember the fire must we turned to the boiling mode on the stove.
customer_reviews.author: S. Li

customer_reviews.title: Get this wok!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent wok that heats up super fast and handles well. I use it for so much more than stir fry too. I think this is a great addition to any kitchen, especially for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Really Picky Guy

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Is quite heavy and well built. Really happy with my purchase. Would recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Practical Buyer :)

product_meta.title: Cooks Standard Stainless Steel Multi-Ply Clad Wok, 13-Inch, Silver
product_meta.description:
COOKS STANDARD MULTI-PLY CLAD STAINLESS-STEEL 13-INCH WOK WITH DOME LID 
Beautifully designed, the three-layer metal cookware features an interior and exterior layer of premium-grade 18/10 stainless steel with a multi-element alloy aluminum core (along the bottom and up the sides) for fast, even heating and thorough heat distribution. Even more, the brushed stainless-steel exterior resists scratches for long-lasting good looks, whether on the stovetop or hanging from a pot rack. The cookware's solid stainless-steel side handle and opposite helper handle come riveted for strength and feature air-flow technology to help them stay cooler to the touch than typical handles. In addition, its secure-fitting stainless-steel dome lid (complete with its own loop handle) traps in heat and moisture for efficient cooking and delicious results. The cookware can be used on all stovetop surfaces, including induction, and it withstands an oven's heat up to 500 degrees F. The wok cleans up easily by hand or in the dishwasher and carries a limited lifetime warranty. 

WHAT IS MULTI-PLY CLAD METAL CONSTRUCTION?
Multi-Ply Clad metal construction is a combination of 18/10 stainless steel with a multi-element aluminum core that creates a permanent bond of metal, so heat passes through the whole pan body from the bottom up the side walls, not just at the bottom, for maximum cooking performance. 

Stainless-steel construction with aluminum core for fast, even heating. DURABLE STAINLESS STEEL WITH EVEN-HEATING ALUMINUM CORE
As part of Cooks Standard's Multi-Ply Clad Stainless Steel cookware, the collection features three layers of clad metal for high-quality performance and excellent cooking results. The interior surface of the cookware provides a smooth, hard layer of premium-grade 18/10 stainless steel, while the stainless-steel exterior offers an elegant mirror-polished finish for enhanced visual appeal.

Best of all, an inner core of multi-element alloy aluminum comes sandwiched between the interior and exterior layer of stainless steel for faster heating and excellent heat distribution. The aluminum core extends from the bottom all the way up the side walls for total coverage. It's the best of both--durable stainless steel for strength combined with the fast, thorough heating of aluminum.

STAY-COOL HANDLES WITH AIR-FLOW TECHNOLOGY
Thoughtfully designed, the cookware's solid stainless-steel handles come riveted for strength and provide an open V-shaped design with air-flow technology that keeps the handle cooler and more comfortable to hold when cooking on the stovetop. The long handles on the pans and the generous loop side handles on the pots make the vessels easy to move around on the stovetop or to safely lift and carry, even when full. Though the handles stay cooler to the touch, pot holders or oven mitts are still recommended. 

Stainless-steel handles stay cool when cooking. OTHER HIGHLIGHTS
The cookware's matching stainless-steel lids fit securely, helping to trap in heat, moisture, and nutrients, plus they come with loop handles for safe, simple placement or removal. Another thoughtful detail includes the cookware's scratch-resistant stainless-steel bases, which come with a brushed finish and that can be safely used on any type of stovetop, including gas, electric, ceramic glass, even induction. Oven-safe up to 500 degrees F, the cookware offers outstanding versatility, transitioning effortlessly from cooking on the stovetop to browning or finishing in the oven (not broiler safe).

ABOUT COOKS STANDARD
Cooks Standard, located in California, USA, designs and manufactures high-quality cookware products for the home and kitchen. Cooks Standard presents professional and home chefs alike with the highest-quality materials, thoughtful design details, and fine craftsmanship--all of which is setting a new standard for the cookware industry.

Scratch-resistant brushed stainless-steel bases. (Induction compatible.)
feature_bullets: 13-inch wok made of 18/10 stainless steel with aluminum core
Solid stainless-steel riveted handles stay cooler with air-flow technology
Secure-fitting stainless-steel dome lid traps in heat and moisture
Measures 23 by 13-1/2 by 5 inches; limited lifetime warranty Shape round
